balanceOfCollateral(address,address).details: Returns the balance of collateral of a user for a given vault.

claimRewards(address).details: Claims rewards for a user for a given vault.

enterPosition(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Enters a position in the lending market.

params.borrowAmount: The amount of assets to borrow.
params.depositAssetAmount: The amount of margin to deposit.
params.depositData: The data to pass to the deposit function.
params.onBehalf: The address of the user to enter the position on behalf of.

exitPosition(address,address,address,uin.details: Exits a position in the lending market. Can be called by the user or another lending router to migrate a position.

params.assetToRepay: The amount of assets to repay, if set to uint256.max the full debt will be repaid.
params.onBehalf: The address of the user to exit the position on behalf of.
params.redeemData: Vault specific instructions for the exit.
params.sharesToRedeem: The amount of shares to redeem.

forceWithdraw(address,address,bytes).details: Forces a withdraw for a user for a given vault, only allowed if the health factor is negative.

params.data: Vault specific instructions for the withdraw.

healthFactor(address,address).details: Returns the health factor of a user for a given vault.

initiateWithdraw(address,address,bytes).details: Initiates a withdraw request for a user for a given vault.

params.data: Vault specific instructions for the withdraw.
params.onBehalf: The address of the user to initiate the withdraw on behalf of.

isApproved(address,address).details: Returns the authorization status of an address.

params.operator: The address to check the authorization status of.
params.user: The address to check the authorization status of.

liquidate(address,address,uint256,uint25.details: Liquidates a position in the lending market.

params.liquidateAccount: The address of the account to liquidate.
params.repaidShares: The amount of shares to repay.
params.seizedAssets: The amount of assets to seize.

returns.sharesToLiquidator: The amount of shares to liquidator.

migratePosition(address,address,address).details: Migrates a position to the lending market.

params.migrateFrom: The address of the lending router to migrate the position from.
params.onBehalf: The address of the user to migrate the position on behalf of.

setApproval(address,bool).details: Authorizes an address to manage a user's position.
